name: Gmail New Look (Ultra Dense)
description:
Gmail style to match up with the Google+ theme I am doing (http://userstyles.org/styles/50141/)
This was designed for the New Gmail Theme (Dense) (currently being called "Preview (Dense)")

Features
-Ultra dense design
-Removes ads
-Adds background
-Some other minor stuff
additional_info:
ALL BUG REPORTS CAN BE SENT TO ME AT CORYLULU@GMAIL.COM (that includes G+) or @corylulu

Release Version 0.8.1

Update Notes:

Release Notes for 0.8.1
-Fixed shifting while hovering over buttons (mostly)
-Fixed the 10px bar on the top of the first item in mail

Release Notes for 0.8.0
-First upload
